sources: Find on ground at mystery island
Crossbreeding: Hybrid Red Roses + Hybrid Red Roses (1.56%) (See steps below)
Step 1: White Roses + White Roses = Purple Roses (25%)
Step 2: Red Roses + Purple Roses = Hybrid Red Roses (50%)
Step 3: Yellow Roses + Hybrid Red = Hybrid Red Roses(25%)
Step 4: Hybrid Red Roses + Hybrid Red Roses = Blue Roses (1.56%)
